channel.title: Error connecting to server?
channel.description: Hi so I was on my server about 20 mins ago, then I closed the client and the run.cmd in the source to run the server. After that, I re-opened both and now it says error connecting to server? Help Please?

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

probably i glitch with something else you did… portforwarding error?

How to find out if you have a protforwarding error?

#1: Run your server and client

#2: Attempt to connect to your sever - If you get “error connecting to sever” procced to #3

#3: Attempt to loging to localhost (ip - 0.0.0.0) - If it works then its a porfworading error else its glitched

Read full topic
